lyricist-1765692696961-exmdj47.title: R&B spark session
lyricist-1765692696961-exmdj47.headline: Flip a headline into punchlines.
lyricist-1765692696961-exmdj47.summary: Curated power words, flows, chords, and a live headline to riff on.
flowPrompts: Hit four internal rhymes per bar.
Keep syllable count locked at eight.
Stack multisyllabic echoes every third word.
lyricist-1765692696961-exmdj47.topicChallenge: Turn the news into a punchline and a plot twist.

newsPrompt.headline: Breakthrough battery tech promises 5-minute charging
newsPrompt.context: Frame it as liberation, anxiety, or hype culture.

lyricFragments: "City lights blink Morse in the puddles"
"Wi-Fi ghosts keep receipts on the low"
"Laughing in emojis, trauma in draft folders"

sampleChallenge.description: Make a beat with 3 sounds max

fuel-1766249061802-r2ppu434a.prompt: Compose a beat that sounds like midnight rain on chrome.
